statements: SELECT * FROM stakeholder_engagement;
SELECT stakeholder_name, report_url FROM stakeholder_engagement WHERE id = 1;
SELECT interactive_map_url FROM stakeholder_engagement WHERE stakeholder_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM stakeholder_engagement ORDER BY stakeholder_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_stakeholders FROM stakeholder_engagement;
SELECT id, stakeholder_name, report_url FROM stakeholder_engagement WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM stakeholder_engagement WHERE stakeholder_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT stakeholder_name, interactive_map_url FROM stakeholder_engagement ORDER BY stakeholder_name DESC;
SELECT id, stakeholder_name, report_url FROM stakeholder_engagement WHERE interactive_map_url IS NOT NULL AND report_url IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, stakeholder_name, report_url FROM stakeholder_engagement WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM stakeholders;
SELECT name, email FROM stakeholders WHERE organization='Company A';
SELECT organization, location FROM stakeholders ORDER BY organization ASC;
SELECT * FROM interactive_maps WHERE shareable=true;
SELECT map_name, map_url FROM interactive_maps WHERE stakeholder_id=1;
SELECT name, organization, email FROM stakeholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT map_name, map_url, shareable FROM interactive_maps WHERE stakeholder_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM stakeholders WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, organization, email FROM stakeholders WHERE organization LIKE '%Corp%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT organization, COUNT(*) AS map_count FROM stakeholders JOIN interactive_maps ON stakeholders.id = interactive_maps.stakeholder_id GROUP BY organization HAVING map_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM stakeholders ORDER BY stakeholder_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, report_name, map_url FROM projects JOIN maps_reports ON projects.project_id = maps_reports.project_id;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_id=1;
SELECT p.project_name, s.stakeholder_name FROM projects p JOIN stakeholders s ON p.project_id = s.stakeholder_id;
SELECT sid, name, email FROM stakeholders;
SELECT map_name, map_data FROM interactive_maps ORDER BY imid DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_data FROM reports WHERE repid = 5;
SELECT project_name, proj_description FROM community_projects WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM stakeholders JOIN community_projects ON stakeholders.sid = community_projects.projid;
SELECT name, email FROM stakeholders;
SELECT map_name, map_data FROM interactive_maps WHERE imid < 5;
SELECT * FROM reports ORDER BY report_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, proj_description, due_date FROM community_projects WHERE due_date > '2021-12-31';
SELECT sid, name, email FROM stakeholders ORDER BY sid DESC;
SELECT * FROM collaborator;
SELECT id, name, email FROM collaborator WHERE id = 1;
SELECT map_name, description FROM interactive_map ORDER BY map_name ASC;
SELECT report_name, date_created FROM report WHERE date_created > '2021-01-01';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project WHERE start_date <= '2022-12-31' AND end_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM collaborator WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM collaborator WHERE name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT map_name, description FROM interactive_map WHERE map_name = 'City Map';
SELECT report_name, date_created FROM report WHERE date_created >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_created;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' AND start_date > '2022-01-01';
